text: you know high technology doesn't always
mean shiny aluminum things sometimes it
comes to more low-tech things like
glasses these are the ad lens glasses as
you turn these little knobs the liquid
inside changes the shape of a membrane
which changes the focus presto you can
dial in your own prescription if you
leave the knobs on you can readjust them
whenever your eyes get tired or someone
else in the house wants to use your
glasses the downside you look like this
or you can snap the knobs off and lock
in your prescription more styles and
smaller knobs someday would be welcome I
also looked at this amazing iPad app
from glasses calm it scans your face
makes a 3d model of your head and then
lets you try on thousands of glasses and
sunglasses so much easier and better
than putting on pair after pair in front
of some store mirror and really really
fun you got to admit it's a great way to
try before you buy and it's nice to see
high-tech finally coming to things
they're a little more low
